arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic boss explains Stockport County team selection - '...still aren't fully fit...'
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney explained the thought process behind his Wigan Athletic team selection for Saturday's 2-0 home defeat at the hands of Stockport County.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic boss: Stockport County defeat summed up our whole season
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney felt Wigan Athletic's home defeat at the hands of Stockport County summed up their season as a whole.

arts.ttl: Two late goals help Stockport to victory at Wigan
Wigan Athletic pay price for profligacy as Stockport County take points
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic were given a stark lesson in clinicality as two late goals at the Brick saw Stockport County continue their fine recent run with a 2-0 victory.

arts.ttl: Team news - Wigan Athletic v Stockport County
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney has made one change to the Wigan Athletic side that bowed out of the FA Cup last weekend against Fulham for Saturday’s League One visit of Stockport County.

arts.ttl: 'I need' - What Wigan Athletic boss has tasked Jonny Smith to do after handing former Burton and Tranmere player new contract
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney has challenged Jonny Smith to up his goal return for Wigan.

arts.ttl: PART 2: Wigan Athletic: The 12th Man - ‘...you either admit defeat or you find a way to turn it into a success...'
arts.sum: Our panel of Latics experts run the rule over an FA Cup exit which saw their side take Premier League Fulham all the way at the Brick, but which threw up so many green shoots of recovery for the weeks and months that lie ahead…

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic: The 12th Man - ‘...when I turned around, Mike Danson was standing behind my chair...’
arts.sum: Our panel of Latics experts run the rule over an FA Cup exit which saw their side take Premier League Fulham all the way at the Brick, but which threw up so many green shoots of recovery for the weeks and months that lie ahead...

arts.ttl: Former Wigan Athletic star calls it a day at 35
arts.sum: Martyn Waghorn admitted to feeling 'proud' of wearing the Wigan Athletic shirt and playing for such 'great clubs' after announcing his retirement from football at the age of 35.
